_source.text: 1 - Alexander McQueen [Designer: Sarah Burton] Honestly - it is a hard, difficult and fucking tough thing to step in shoes that are as big as those of a man called Alexander McQueen - a legend and a truly unique character of a designer , but Sarah Burton did it and she did it better than anyone could have done.
